conditionalHelpers.title: #if
conditionalHelpers.description: Conditionally render a block. If its argument returns false, undefined, null, '', 0, or [], Handlebars will not render the block.

conditionalHelpers.title: #unless
conditionalHelpers.description: The inverse of the if helper. Its block will be rendered if the expression returns a falsy value.

iterationHelpers.title: #each
iterationHelpers.description: Iterate over a list using the built-in each helper. Inside the block, you can use this to reference the element being iterated over.

mathHelpers.title: Display a Number as Currency
mathHelpers.description: Formats a number as currency based on the user's locale.

mathHelpers.title: Display a Number as a Percentage
mathHelpers.description: Converts a number to a percentage format.

mathHelpers.title: Specify Maximum Decimal Places
mathHelpers.description: Limits the number of decimal places displayed.

mathHelpers.title: Specify Minimum Decimal Places
mathHelpers.description: Ensures a minimum number of decimal places are shown.

mathHelpers.title: Round a Number Up
mathHelpers.description: Rounds a number up, with options for rounding away from zero or toward positive infinity.

mathHelpers.title: Round a Number Down
mathHelpers.description: Rounds a number down, with options for rounding toward zero or toward negative infinity.

mathHelpers.title: Round to Nearest Neighbor
mathHelpers.description: Rounds a number to its nearest neighbor, with options for rounding to the nearest even number, up, or down.

mathHelpers.title: Make Long Numbers Easier to Read
mathHelpers.description: Adds commas to long numbers for better readability.

mathHelpers.title: Specify Custom Number Format
mathHelpers.description: Applies a custom format to a number.

mathHelpers.title: Display Remainder After Division
mathHelpers.description: Shows the remainder after dividing one number by another.

mathHelpers.title: Check if One Number Equals Another
mathHelpers.description: Checks if two numbers are equal.

mathHelpers.title: Check if One Number is Greater Than Another
mathHelpers.description: Determines if one number is greater than another.

mathHelpers.title: Check if One Number is Greater Than or Equal to Another
mathHelpers.description: Checks if one number is greater than or equal to another.

mathHelpers.title: Check if One Number is Less Than Another
mathHelpers.description: Determines if one number is less than another.

mathHelpers.title: Check if One Number is Less Than or Equal to Another
mathHelpers.description: Checks if one number is less than or equal to another.

textHelpers.title: replace
textHelpers.description: Finds and replaces all occurrences of one string with a different string.

textHelpers.title: abbreviate
textHelpers.description: Shortens a string to a specified length and adds an ellipsis (...).

textHelpers.title: center
textHelpers.description: Adds a series of specified characters to each side of a word or phrase to add padding around the text and center it.

textHelpers.title: slugify
textHelpers.description: Lowercases a string, removes non-word characters (numbers, underscores, and apostrophes), strips leading and trailing spaces, and converts spaces to hyphens.
